Scriptal.Name: Force Stop Radio Call
Scriptal.Description: Almost immediately stops any ongoing support radio call by rapidly fading out the radio and ending the subtitle display. This operation is fast enough that it can mute common radio calls if applied to the same event, like Kaz's common "That's the Target" line when applied to the Marker -> "ChangeToEnable" event. However, if applied to a Radio -> "Start" event, the opening radio noise can still be heard for a brief moment.
